huaishih_wen wrote:

> 1. Can JUnit run test methods in a particular order?

Yes. The original design of JUnit (JUnit 1.x) forced you to specify the 
order of your tests. You can implement the suite() method to make that 
happen.

Another potential help is GSBase's OrderedTestSuite.

> 2. What is the best approach to unit test database code?

Google "dallaway unit test database", then read _JUnit Recipes_ chapter 10.

> 3. What is the best approach to unit test threaded program?

Test the code thoroughly in single-threaded mode first. Use Doug Lea's 
concurrency package. Other than that, I'll wait for other suggestions.
